com.hci.geotagger.activities
Class MapViewActivity

java.lang.Object
  android.app.Activity
      android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
          com.hci.geotagger.activities.MapViewActivity

public class MapViewActivity
extends FragmentActivity

This class shows a Map view. Currently not used in this iteration of GeoTagger. Separate MapViewViewFragment used instead in TagViewActivity(please see com.hci.geotagger.Objects package for Fragments used and their implementations).
